description: Angular component for displaying and managing a product list page, including product fetching, filtering, pagination, and interactions such as navigation and adding to wishlist.

classes.name: ProductListComponent
classes.description: Angular component class responsible for displaying and interacting with a list of products, including filtering, pagination, and navigation actions.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook called after component initialization, triggers product fetch.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetches the list of products from ProductService based on current filters and pagination.

methods.name: applyFilters
methods.description: Applies current filter values and refreshes the product list.

methods.name: clearFilters
methods.description: Clears all filter inputs and reloads the product list.

methods.name: prevPage
methods.description: Navigates to the previous page of products if available.

methods.name: nextPage
methods.description: Navigates to the next page of products if available.

methods.name: openDetail
methods.description: Navigates to the detailed view of a specific product.

methods.name: addToWishlist
methods.description: Adds a product to the wishlist via WishlistService.
